message.body: fyi: my service comes and goes. We're upstairs though
Just woke up from a hardcore nap. Are you still at the festival?
Aw man! We're just heading out.
Back to ##########, thAt is. But we'll see you in May!
I am sorry to doze off and miss the day, but I must say that nap was glorious! ###### may be on to something with those :).
Nice to see you even though it was short. Looking forward to catching up more properly soon :).
I have yet to get on the nap bandwagon but I'm thinking I should...
######'s been preaching the good word of The Nap for some time now...
